short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily switch between active tabs and close them using keyboard shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to use the extension
- Alt + Shift + ← ... Activate the left tab in the window
- Alt + Shift + → ... Activate the right tab in the window
- Alt + Shift + ↑ ... Close the current active tab
